name: One Minute Ambulance
description:
You are an ambulance driver and you have to deliver vaccines against a deadly Virus. 
Drive over Virus particles to gather score and reach your destination to save your score. Your score will be lost if you fail to make the delivery. The GPS arrow pointer will point towards the Delivery point.

Best of Luck

P.S. you only have a minute to make the delivery

Features:

1.  Randomly Generated Maps

2.  3D Graphics

IMPORTANT: Sometimes due to a bug in Level Generator, the Player does not spawn. In such cases, go to the main menu and start again.

Assets used :

1.  371 Simple Buttons Pack by Nayrissa. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/371-simple-buttons-pack-97516

2.  Down Town Pack - Lite by Gamemag Creation Studio. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/down-town-pack-lite-77864

3.  Low Poly Road Pack by Broken Vector. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/roadways/low-poly-road-pack-67288

4.  Lowpoly Modern City Buildings by karboosx. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/lowpoly-modern-city-buildings-set-64427

5.  Procedural Level Generator by Juan Rodriguez. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/ai/procedural-level-generator-136626

6.  Kenny's Car Kit. https://www.kenney.nl/assets/car-kit

7. Casual Soldiers - Mini Music Pack. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/casual-soldiers-mini-music-pack-4050
